concept.definition:
[PR] Transverse
All dimensions should be Transverse, Anterior-Posterior, and Craniocaudal dimension

[PR] Anterior-Posterior
All dimensions should be Transverse, Anterior-Posterior, and Craniocaudal dimension

[PR] Craniocaudal
All dimensions should be Transverse, Anterior-Posterior, and Craniocaudal dimension

[PR] LargestSize
All dimensions should be Largest, Medium, Smallest

[PR] Anterior-Posterior
All dimensions should be Largest, Medium, Smallest

[PR] SmallestSize
All dimensions should be Largest, Medium, Smallest
